userStories.question: Besides medications, what else has worked for you?

condition.description:
Pulmonary hypertension (PH) is high blood pressure in the arteries to your lungs. It is a serious condition. If you have it, the blood vessels that carry blood from your heart to your lungs become hard and narrow. Your heart has to work harder to pump the blood through. Over time, your heart weakens and cannot do its job and you can develop heart failure.

Symptoms of PH include

  • Shortness of breath during routine activity, such as climbing two flights of stairs
  • Tiredness
  • Chest pain
  • A racing heartbeat
  • Pain on the upper right side of the abdomen
  • Decreased appetite

As PH worsens, you may find it hard to do any physical activities.

There are two main kinds of PH. One runs in families or appears for no known reason. The other kind is related to another condition, usually heart or lung disease.

There is no cure for PH. Treatments can control symptoms. They involve treating the heart or lung disease, medicines, oxygen, and sometimes lung transplantation.

NIH: National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute
condition.name: Pulmonary hypertension

userStories.tip: That it can cause severe oedema

carousel_items: Comes in two differents doses: one that's taken on a regular basis and the other only when you need it.
If you're taking Cialis on a regular basis, take it at the same time every day.
Don't take [name_ommon] more than once a day.
Can be taken with or without food.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol when you're taking this medication since it can make dizziness worse.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Cialis is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection. Cialis also treats enlarged prostate symptoms.
basics.bottom_line: Cialis is the only medication in its class that treats both erectile dysfunction and enlarged prostate symptoms. You can also take it on a regular basis, which can allow for more spontaneity, but it can be expensive.
downsides: Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

downsides_processed.orig: Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.

Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It's the only one in its class to also treat enlarged prostate symptoms.
Can be taken either as needed, or on a regular basis (which allows you to be more spontaneous before sex).
Can be taken with or without food.
Lasts longer than Viagra.

drugs.name: Cialis

carousel_items_processed.orig: Comes in two differents doses: one that's taken on a regular basis and the other only when you need it.
If you're taking Cialis on a regular basis, take it at the same time every day.
Don't take [name_ommon] more than once a day.
Can be taken with or without food.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol when you're taking this medication since it can make dizziness worse.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Cialis for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past. Also, it is not recommended for men to take Cialis if they've had a heart attack in the past 3 months or a stroke or a diagnosis of moderate to severe heart failure in the past 6 months.  Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

description_processed.orig: Taking Cialis for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past. Also, it is not recommended for men to take Cialis if they've had a heart attack in the past 3 months or a stroke or a diagnosis of moderate to severe heart failure in the past 6 months.  Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Prolonged erection
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Cialis. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Cialis. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.title: Vision changes
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

risks_warnings.title: Hearing loss
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

carousel_items: Need to take this drug at the same time every day.
Can cause a headache, flushing, or nosebleeds.
Don't take two doses at the same time if you missed a dose.
The oral liquid (suspension) is good for 60 days or 2 months. Make sure to shake it well before using.

basics.benefits_moa: Revatio is a PDE-5 inhibitor. It relaxes blood vessels in the lungs, which lowers their blood pressure.
basics.bottom_line: Revatio is a first-choice treatment for pulmonary hypertension (high blood pressure in the lungs).
downsides: Can cause dizziness during the first few days of taking this medication.
If you're using Revatio for high blood pressure in the lungs, you can't use Viagra or other erectile dysfunction drugs.
You also can't use other forms of nitrates or nitroglycerin while on Revatio.

downsides_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness during the first few days of taking this medication.
If you're using Revatio for high blood pressure in the lungs, you can't use Viagra or other erectile dysfunction drugs.
You also can't use other forms of nitrates or nitroglycerin while on Revatio.

upsides: It's a first-choice medication for treating high blood pressure in the lungs.
It's available as a generic medication.
Different doses of Sildenafil are also used to treat erectile dysfunction.

upsides_processed.orig: It's a first-choice medication for treating high blood pressure in the lungs.
It's available as a generic medication.
Different doses of Sildenafil are also used to treat erectile dysfunction.

carousel_items: It's best to take Viagra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.
Works best when taken on an empty stomach. Fatty foods can prevent Viagra from working as well.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Viagra is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection.
basics.bottom_line: Viagra is a first-choice treatment for erectile dysfunction. It's the only one that's available as a generic, so it's cheaper than the alternatives. However, you need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex, so the lack of spontaneity may not be good for some people.
downsides: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.
Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).
Taking it after eating a high-fat meal can delay or reduce the medication's benefits.

downsides_processed.orig: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.

It can be taken only when you need it.

carousel_items: Can cause headaches, dizziness, lightheadedness, or fainting.
Don't drink alcohol while taking this medicine. It can make you really dizzy.
Tell your doctor if you're taking any medicine for erectile dysfunction.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

basics.benefits_moa: Isosorbide dinitrate is a nitrate. It dilates blood vessels all over the body. This makes it less work for the heart to pump, which relieves heart-related chest pain.
basics.bottom_line: Isosorbide dinitrate is good for chest pain, but you have to be able to stick to your dosing schedule or it won't work as well.
downsides: You can develop tolerance to this medicine over time, which means that the same dose becomes less effective. You have to stick to a really specific dosing schedule to prevent this from happening.
Headaches are normal with this medicine and they go away as your body gets used to it, but they can be severe or not tolerable for some people.

downsides_processed.orig: You can develop tolerance to this medicine over time, which means that the same dose becomes less effective. You have to stick to a really specific dosing schedule to prevent this from happening.
Headaches are normal with this medicine and they go away as your body gets used to it, but they can be severe or not tolerable for some people.

upsides: Treats and prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) from the narrowing of heart blood vessels (coronary artery disease).

upsides_processed.orig: Treats and prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) from the narrowing of heart blood vessels (coronary artery disease).

userStories.identifier: lawyer who loves exercise such as tennis

drugs.name: Isordil

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause headaches, dizziness, lightheadedness, or fainting.
Don't drink alcohol while taking this medicine. It can make you really dizzy.
Tell your doctor if you're taking any medicine for erectile dysfunction.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Dizziness and falls may occur due to a sudden drop in blood pressure when you change positions, like from lying down or sitting to standing. This is called orthostatic hypotension. If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly until your body is used to the medicine. If symptoms continues for more than a week, talk to your doctor. Also tell your doctor if you are taking any drugs for erectile dysfunction, as this can increase the likelihood of dizziness or falls. Drinking alcohol while on this medication may also increase the risk of dizziness or falling.

description_processed.orig: Dizziness and falls may occur due to a sudden drop in blood pressure when you change positions, like from lying down or sitting to standing. This is called orthostatic hypotension. If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly until your body is used to the medicine. If symptoms continues for more than a week, talk to your doctor. Also tell your doctor if you are taking any drugs for erectile dysfunction, as this can increase the likelihood of dizziness or falls. Drinking alcohol while on this medication may also increase the risk of dizziness or falling.

risks_warnings.title: Tolerance
risks_warnings.description: Your body can get used to Isosorbide dinitrate and the same amount of medicine no longer works as well as it used to, also known as tolerance. Tolerance can be avoided by having enough time in between taking the medicine. Tolerance cannot be fixed by increasing the amount of the medicine. Make sure there is enough time in between the doses. Your doctor or pharmacist will work with you to stop this from happening.

description_processed.orig: Your body can get used to Isosorbide dinitrate and the same amount of medicine no longer works as well as it used to, also known as tolerance. Tolerance can be avoided by having enough time in between taking the medicine. Tolerance cannot be fixed by increasing the amount of the medicine. Make sure there is enough time in between the doses. Your doctor or pharmacist will work with you to stop this from happening.

Your doctor might do routine blood tests to check your liver function.

basics.benefits_moa: Nifedipine is a calcium channel blocker. It lowers blood pressure by slowing your heart rate and relaxing your blood vessels. Your heart gets more oxygen and doesn't have to work as hard to pump, which can relieve chest pain.
basics.bottom_line: Nifedipine works well to lower blood pressure and prevent chest pain, but you have to be okay with avoiding grapefruit. You can't miss doses, and you might get persistent swelling.
downsides: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Nifedipine than men.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Nifedipine suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Not a good medication for you if you love grapefruit. It can make Nifedipine have a stronger effect on your blood pressure.

downsides_processed.orig: Calcium channel blockers can cause swelling in your limbs. If this happens for you, it probably won't get better over time, so talk to your doctor about alternatives if it bothers you.
Women are more likely to have side effects (especially swelling) from Nifedipine than men.
You can't miss doses. Stopping Nifedipine suddenly can cause your blood pressure to go up suddenly, which raises the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Not a good medication for you if you love grapefruit. It can make Nifedipine have a stronger effect on your blood pressure.

upsides: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Calcium channel blockers work especially well for African Americans to lower blood pressure.
You can take it alone or with other medicines to help lower blood pressure.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Prevents heart-related chest pain (angina) if you take it regularly.
Treats certain abnormal heart rhythms.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and controls heart rate.

userStories.tip: Swelling pain in limbs, so intense in the feet (turned puffy bright red) couldn't stand up had to elevate for hours, wasn't worth the trouble.

drugs.name: Nifedipine

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness or headaches in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause face flushing and ankle or foot swelling.
Avoid grapefruit while taking this medicine.
Your doctor might do routine blood tests to check your liver function.

risks_warnings.title: Intestinal blockage
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of obstruction within the intestines, sometimes requiring surgery. If you develop sudden constipation, especially if accompanied with a fever, contact your doctor immediately.
risk_factors: Taking anti-inflammatories, acid reducers in the stomach, anticholinergics, laxatives, levothyroxine

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of obstruction within the intestines, sometimes requiring surgery. If you develop sudden constipation, especially if accompanied with a fever, contact your doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Chest pain
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of increased chest pain when people have started taking this medication, especially if they are on beta-blockers. Let your doctor know if you are on beta-blockers if they do not know this. Your doctor will talk to you about how to take care of this.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of increased chest pain when people have started taking this medication, especially if they are on beta-blockers. Let your doctor know if you are on beta-blockers if they do not know this. Your doctor will talk to you about how to take care of this.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage/jaundice
risks_warnings.description: Reports of liver damage have occurred while on this medication, especially if you have had cirrhosis. Your doctor will monitor your liver on a regular basis. Tell your doctor if you or your caregivers/family notice your skin or the whites of your eyes are becoming yellower, pain in your abdomen, or sudden confusion.

description_processed.orig: Reports of liver damage have occurred while on this medication, especially if you have had cirrhosis. Your doctor will monitor your liver on a regular basis. Tell your doctor if you or your caregivers/family notice your skin or the whites of your eyes are becoming yellower, pain in your abdomen, or sudden confusion.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Sudden drops in blood pressure have been noted while on this medication, with possible heart attacks. Talk to your doctor about the signs of a heart attack and call 911 immediately if you experience these.

description_processed.orig: Sudden drops in blood pressure have been noted while on this medication, with possible heart attacks. Talk to your doctor about the signs of a heart attack and call 911 immediately if you experience these.

risks_warnings.title: Congestive heart failure
risks_warnings.description: Rare reports of congestive heart failure have been reported in people taking this medication with beta blockers. Make sure your prescriber is aware that you are taking this medication.

description_processed.orig: Rare reports of congestive heart failure have been reported in people taking this medication with beta blockers. Make sure your prescriber is aware that you are taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or increased chest pain
risks_warnings.description: Reports of chest pain/angina and heart attack have been noted in people who have obstructive coronary artery disease while on this medication. Tell your doctor if you have this condition or if you have concerns.

description_processed.orig: Reports of chest pain/angina and heart attack have been noted in people who have obstructive coronary artery disease while on this medication. Tell your doctor if you have this condition or if you have concerns.

points.name: Constipation
